title: Fix fire effect to match SCRFIRE and ly Doom implementations
description:
Current fire effect in sysc-Go is optimized for sysc-greet but not correct for fullscreen use.

Need to reimplement based on proper fire algorithms:
- https://github.com/b4tec/SCRFIRE
- https://github.com/fairyglade/ly/blob/master/src/animations/Doom.zig

The current implementation works for sysc-greet but needs the full doom-style fire effect for screensaver use.
